short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve website interfaces to be easier to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of searching for someone in Twitter and not knowing who they are? In response to https://twitter.com/realGeorgeHotz/status/1595270867402956801, building out an extension that injects code into Twitter to make the browsing experience make sense.

While we're at it, we'll be adding improvements to other irritating UI issues across the web as well.
